mapper.select: SELECT m.matchID, m.homeTeamID, a.name as homeName, m.awayTeamID, b.name as awayName, m.time FROM matching as m, team as a, team as b WHERE m.state = 1 and m.courtID = #{stadium} and date = date_format(now(), '%Y-%m-%d') and m.homeTeamID = a.teamID and m.awayTeamID = b.teamID order by m.time ASC
select courtID, name from court where locationID=#{location}
